name: Bootstrap_3_2_0
notes: Provides plugins: alert, button, carousel, collapse, dropdown, modal, tooltip, popover, scrollspy, tab, affix

name: NEXSM_XFS_Automation
description: Automation for eXpOS/eXpFS/NEXSM build and xfs-interface workflows

flows.name: build
steps: Optionally compile code via nested Makefile

flows.name: xfs-setup
steps: Format disk image with xfs-interface fdisk

name: NeuroXFS_Integration
description: Neuromorph / OrganicCPU-oriented workflow derived from classic xfs-interface usage
steps: Format sovereign disk image with neurorights-aware metadata
Load EXEC shards (.xexe) into EXEC zone
Load DATA, LEDGER, and MODEL shards with governance descriptors
List and inspect shards via neuroxfs ls
Export only shards that satisfy neurorights and SoulNonTradeableShield constraints
